title: How much carbs in the food? Restaurants to be pulled up for lack of nutrition info
description: The government decided to target restaurants failing to disclose nutritional information on their menus, impacting numerous establishments across India. Although required since July 2022, many restaurants remained non-compliant. FSSAI intended to send notices and enforce guidelines, enhancing consumer awareness about nutritional content in food. This move aimed to bolster food safety.
